tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TravelDestinations (
  destination_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  destination_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  attractions TEXT[],
  visitor_reviews JSON
)

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  destination_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  rating FLOAT,
  comment TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Destinations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  destination_name VARCHAR(255),
  country VARCHAR(100),
  region VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Attractions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  attraction_name VARCHAR(255),
  destination_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (destination_id) REFERENCES Destinations(id),
  opening_hours VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE VisitorReviews (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  attraction_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (attraction_id) REFERENCES Attractions(id),
  visitor_name VARCHAR(100),
  rating INT,
  review TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE destinations (
    id INT,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    country VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE attractions (
    id INT,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    destination_id INT,
    description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (id),
    FOREIGN KEY (destination_id) REFERENCES destinations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    id INT,
    attraction_id INT,
    rating INT,
    comment TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (id),
    FOREIGN KEY (attraction_id) REFERENCES attractions(id)
);

CREATE TABLE visitors (
    id INT,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    nationality VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE destinations (
  destination_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  destination_name TEXT,
  country TEXT,
  city TEXT,
  region TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE attractions (
  attraction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  destination_id UUID,
  attraction_name TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE attraction_reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  attraction_id UUID,
  review_text TEXT,
  review_date DATE,
  rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE visitors (
  visitor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  visitor_name TEXT,
  nationality TEXT,
  age INT,
  gender TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE visitor_reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  visitor_id UUID,
  attraction_id UUID,
  review_text TEXT,
  rating FLOAT
);
